title: Pring, "Paper Doll Costume in White Fur with Pink Bow", 1876–80
medium: Lithograph, brush and watercolor on cream heavy wove paper
description: White fur lined coat with fur lining and pink bow at collar. A glimmer of her emerald and gold full skirt peek out from under her coat.  Her white gloved hands hold a fan and a handkerchief.  Both the front and back of this outfit represented.

tombstone.epitaph:
Pring, "Paper Doll Costume in White Fur with Pink Bow", 1876–80.
1876–80. Lithograph, brush and watercolor on cream heavy wove paper. Gift of Grace Lincoln Temple. 1937-22-17.
